docs.lead_paragraph: Experimentation is the very essence of science. Even the astrophysicists whose lifework it is to tell us how remote stars are constituted cannot dispense with it. They create in terrestrial laboratories the conditions that probably prevail in the sun and on the planets, and make the necessary inferences.
